abstract.p: Kimco Realty Corp of New Hyde Park, NY, declares regularly quarterly dividend on Class A preferred stock of 48.4 cents (S)

block.p: The Kimco Realty Corporation of New Hyde Park (NYSE: KIM) declared a regular quarterly dividend on its Class A preferred stock of 48.4 cents per depository share, to be paid Aug. 15 to shareholders of record on Aug. 1.

Kimco, a real estate investment trust, specializes in shopping center acquisitions, development and management, and owns and operates the nation's largest portfolio of neighborhood and community shopping centers, with interests in 483 properties totaling 63 million square feet of leasable space in 41 states.
